original_text:
An evil man is ensnared by the transgression of his lips,
    but the righteous escapes from trouble.
korean_text: 악인은 입술의 허물로 말미암아 그물에 걸려도 의인은 환난에서 벗어나느니라

sentences.original_text: An evil man is ensnared by the transgression of his lips
sentences.korean_translation: 악인은 자기 입술의 허물 때문에 올무에 걸립니다.

sentences.original_text: but the righteous escapes from trouble.
